com.mobius.vdrapi
Class QueryParam

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.mobius.vdrapi.QueryParam
Direct Known Subclasses:
DocumentServerQueryParam, EnhancedSearchTopicItemQueryParam, FilterQueryParam, SearchTopicItemQueryParam, TopicItemEntryQueryParam, TopicListQueryParam
public class QueryParam
extends Object

The QueryParam class holds the parameters that frame a query. By using a class to hold the query parameters, you can use the same createList function for different parameters. If you need more parameters for a query, create a new subclass to hold the additional parameters.

Note: Please be aware that query results are always presented in the sort order in which they are stored on the document server, regardless of the comparison value you specify.

For example, if you are retrieving three items from a list of 10 items, and you specify that the three items should be less than or equal to the value of the fifth item, the results list presents the items in the order in which they appear in the document list, namely 3, 4, 5.

See Also:
IListFactory.createList(com.mobius.vdrapi.QueryParam)

Constructor Detail

QueryParam

public QueryParam(String keyValue,
                  ComparisonSpec comparison,
                  int requestCount)
Creates a new QueryParam. Accepts a key value, a comparison specification, and a request count as parameters. The maximum request count value is 32767. If you specify a request count greater than 32767, the maximum value of 32767 will be used instead.

Changes the number of items requested. The maximum request count value is 32767. If you specify a request count greater than 32767, the maximum value of 32767 will be used instead.
